00027 #include "generic_board.h"

00029 class AppSettings;
00030 
00031 class V1731Board :      public GenericBoard
00032 {
00033 public:
00034         V1731Board( AppSettings* p_app_settings, bool is_des_mode);
00035 
00036         //
00037         // Pure virtual implementation
00038         wxString GetTypeString() { return this->m_is_des_mode? _("V1731_DES"): _("V1731");};
00039         CVT_V17XX_TYPES GetType(){ return CVT_V1731;};
00040         double GetClockMHz() const { return CVT_V17XX_BOARD_CLOCK_KHZ[ this->m_is_des_mode? CVT_V1731_DES_BOARD_CLOCK_INDEX: CVT_V1731_BOARD_CLOCK_INDEX]*0.001;};
00041         int GetSampleBit() const { return 8;} 
00042         double GetVolt2Bit() const { return ((double)( 1<< 16)) / 1.081;};
00043         UINT8 GetChEnableMsk() const { return this->m_is_des_mode? 0x55: 0xff;} ;
00044         double GetFPGADivider() const { return 4;}
00045 
00046         //
00047         // Virtuals override
00048         virtual double GetDACUpdateFactor( void){ return 8.0;};
00049

00052         bool m_is_des_mode;

00054 };
